name: Gabriel's Portfolio
tagline: Mobile development with Android, iOS, Objective-C, Swift, Maps, Wearables and more.
body:
This is some of the projects I was involved, check it out.

### Plantare
Socio Ambiental application, to give incentive to everyone for increase plantation in the City's around the World.

[Be part of it](https://github.com/gabeira/Plantare)

[Oficial site](http://plantare.mobi)

 
### Aqui / Here
Map application, were I used to learn and practice some iOS and Android.

[Apple Store](https://itunes.apple.com/US/app/id686338374)

[Play Store](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=br.com.gabrielbernardopereira.Aqui)


### Moony
Samsung Video Platform.

[Play Store](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=br.org.sidia.moony)


### Continente Telem√≥vel
Supermarket loyalty club card application for SONAE.

[Apple Store](https://itunes.apple.com/br/app/continente/id600514064)

[Play Store](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=pt.continente.ContinenteTelemovel)


### Snapfish
Hewlett Packard Photo Application.

[Apple Store](https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/snapfish/id330035194)


### Contact me 
Send me an [email](gabeira@gmail.com) to change some ideas, and to know more about me just check my [Linkedin](http://linkedin.com/in/gabeira).
